tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Tasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255),
  task_description TEXT,
  task_due_date DATE,
  task_status VARCHAR(50),
  task_labels JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(50),
    task_due_date TIMESTAMP,
    task_labels JSONB
);
CREATE TABLE tasks (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name TEXT, task_description TEXT, label_id INT);
CREATE TABLE labels (label_id INT PRIMARY KEY, label_name TEXT);
CREATE TABLE task_labels (task_id INT, label_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (task_id, label_id));
CREATE TABLE tasks (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name VARCHAR(255), task_description TEXT, task_status VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE labels (label_id INT PRIMARY KEY, label_name VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE task_labels (task_id INT, label_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (task_id, label_id))
CREATE TABLE task_history (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_id INT, history_event VARCHAR(255), timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR,
    task_description VARCHAR,
    task_status VARCHAR,
    task_due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE task_labels (
    task_id INT,
    label_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (task_id, label_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (label_id) REFERENCES labels(label_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_tasks (
    user_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, task_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);
